extension.name: Geodata Filler
extension.description:
When CiviCRM geocodes an address, the geocoding service generally returns a full collection of address fields, including street, city, etc. CiviCRM, however, typically uses only the latitude and longitude fields and discards everything else.
This extension allows site administrators to set a policy for what to do with that information on a field-by-field basis: discard it, fill in missing data, or overwrite existing data.
Settings are managed by visiting "Administer > System Settings > Geodata Filler."
extension.comments: This extension requires CiviCRM version 4.7.7 or greater, due to its reliance upon hook_civicrm_geocoderFormat, which was introduced in that version. This extension declares a new hook hook_civicrm_geofill_parser, which developers may use to add support for additional geocoding services.
